lyrics:
11 contributorsbrokenheartsville lyricsverse 1
he wore that cowboy hat
to cover up his horns
sweet talkin forked tongue
had a tempting charm

bridge
before i turned around
that girl was gone
all i can say is
bartender pour me something strong

chorus
heres to the past
they can kiss my glass
i hope shes happy with him
heres to the girl
who wrecked my world
that angel who did me in

postchorus
i think the devil drives a coupe de ville
i watched em drive away over the hill
not against her will
and ive got time to kill
down in brokenheartsville
see joe nichols liveget tickets as low as 57you might also likeverse 2
it was long and chrome
sittin in the lot
and fire engine red
that thing was hot

bridge
he revved it up
she waved goodbye
well loves gone to hell
and so have i
